snippet.title: One Piece Odyssey - Official Release Date Trailer | TGS 2022
snippet.description:
One Piece Odyssey is heading to PC and consoles in 2023. Watch the release date trailer, revealed during TGS 2022, which fills us in on the upcoming adventure's story. Journey to the ancient lost island, Waford, with the Straw Hat Crew in this new, original story from Eiichiro Oda. One Piece Odyssey is coming to PC, PS5, Xbox Series X/S, PS4, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch on January 13, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming #OnePiece
